en.issuedAppStatusMsgDetails: Your application has passed checks by court staff and the next stage of your divorce has begun. You have been sent a copy of the application by email.
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetail1: The service centre sent the application to your {{ divorceWho }} by post on {{ case.issueDate | date }}. They were also sent an ‘acknowledgement of service’. This is a form which asks if they:
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list1: agree with what you’ve said in the application
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list2: intend to try to stop the divorce (defend it)
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list3: object to paying the costs (if you’ve claimed them)
en.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails3: They have been asked to respond within 7 working days. If they don’t respond within 30 days you’ll be sent an email from the court telling you what to do next.

cy.issuedAppStatusMsg: Mae eich cais ar y gweill
cy.issuedAppStatusMsgDetails: Mae eich cais wedi pasio gwiriadau staff y llys ac mae cam nesaf eich ysgariad wedi dechrau. Mae copi o'ch cais wedi’i anfon atoch ar e-bost.
cy.issuedWhatHappensNextDetail1: Mi wnaeth y Gwasanaeth Llysoedd a Thribiwnlysoedd anfon y cais at eich {{ divorceWho }} drwy’r post ar {{ case.issueDate | date }}. Anfonwyd ‘cydnabyddiad cyflwyno’ atynt hefyd.  Ffurflen yw hon sy’n gofyn os ydynt yn:
cy.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list1: cytuno gyda beth rydych wedi'i ddweud yn y cais
cy.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails2list3: gwrthwynebu talu'r costau (os ydych wedi’u hawlio)
cy.issuedWhatHappensNextDetails3: Gofynnwyd iddynt ymateb ymhen 7 diwrnod.  Os nad ydyn nhw'n ymateb o fewn 30 diwrnod, byddwch yn cael neges e-bost gan y llys yn dweud wrthych beth i'w wneud nesaf.
